Text: I have downloaded the movie with all files, but how do I get danish subtitels on the movie?

I watch in VLC ( http://www.videolan.org/vlc/ )

On the screen > right click > video > Subtitles track > And choose Danish

Good Luck :D
fantastic work uploader, you are making two versions of every film with 2 channel and 5 channel audio. And thanks for this film too.
